meanings.definition: An ornament at the eaves of a tile roof concealing the joints between tiles.
meanings.sent1: The antefix added a beautiful touch to the roof.
meanings.sent2: The antefix was carefully placed to hide the gaps between tiles.
meanings.sent3: The antefix seemed to be winking mischievously in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The antefix stood like a guardian at the edge of the roof.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the antefix made the roof look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: A vertical block at the end of a row of tiles in a Roman roof.
meanings.sent1: The antefix marked the completion of the row of tiles.
meanings.sent2: In ancient Rome, the antefix was a common feature of roofs.
meanings.sent3: The antefix looked like a tiny tower standing proudly at the edge.
meanings.sent4: The antefix resembled a miniature pillar holding up the roof.
meanings.sent5: The Roman antefix added a touch of history to the building.

meanings.definition: A decorative element used to cover the ends of roof tiles.
meanings.sent1: The antefix enhanced the overall appearance of the roof.
meanings.sent2: Each antefix was uniquely designed to complement the tiles.
meanings.sent3: The antefix seemed to be waving at the passing clouds.
meanings.sent4: The antefix was like a crown for the roof tiles.
meanings.sent5: The colorful antefix brightened up the entire roof.
